Text:
I have found better quality video of the QI Red Nose Day Special, which I have just uploaded in two versions: one file that is just the QI show (QI.S08.RedNoseDay), and another file that includes the warmup and adverts and retakes as well as the show (QI.S08.RedNoseDay+warmup+ads+retake). 

I suggest you download one or both of the new files, and NOT this file.
